column5: This is a very good price on this unitGarmin GPSmap 60CSX  I had one for 4 years now and it very versatile. Use it for fishing, Geocaching with the kids, in the car, on my snowmobile.  Rob C
That's a steal. I paid about double that a few years ago. And I agree. It's an awesome machine.
They're blowing them out to make room for the sexy new 62 series.    https://buy.garmin.com/shop/shop.do?cID=143&fKeys=FILTER_SERIES_62
If I remember correctly, Bill M has one as well, and,highly recommended it when I was searching for one a little while back.  Still haven't purchased one, this is "mighty tempting"!!

I bought the CS, not the CSx, since I don't like the barometric altimeter, but otherwise it's identical... Oh, and I love this unit! Looking back, maybe the barometer would have been a good idea for trending pressure for fishing, but such is life.... You can't go wrong with these units, especially at a price like that.
You are correct.  I love my unit..  Everything from bushwacking into Chapleau back lakes to using BlueCharts out on Simcoe in the winter for lakers and whities..   Absolutely love it.
Smae here...I have the 76csx, and they are amazing units.  Nothing wrong with that price for the 60....good post, Rob C
That is a great deal!! Ive had mine for 2 yesr... super unit!
Thank you Rob C for your post.  And I thank Rob C and everyone else because it was your positive words about the 60CSx that made me not hesitate to order one from CostCo.  carp-starter
Anybody looking for a Garmin GPS Map 76 the pawn shop in Trenton across from Lang and Fetter motors has one for sale $100.00.Comes with box and all the books.
